scripts.pages:deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist
scripts.network:urls: node -e "const os = require('os'); const nets = os.networkInterfaces(); const ips = []; Object.keys(nets).forEach(name => { if(name.includes('WiFi') || name.includes('Ethernet') || name.includes('Wi-Fi')) { nets[name].forEach(net => { if(net.family === 'IPv4' && !net.internal && !net.address.startsWith('172.') && !net.address.startsWith('169.254')) { ips.push(net.address); } }); } }); ips.forEach(ip => { console.log(`Frontend: http://${ip}:3000`); console.log(`Worker: http://${ip}:8787`); console.log('---'); });"
scripts.upgrade: npm prune && npm list -g npm-check-updates || npm i -g npm-check-updates && npx ncu -u && npm update
